desc: Shop our collection of cannabinoids products. Each selection is crafted from the purest ingredients on our Pennsylvania farm, contains less than 0.3 percent THC on a dry-weight basis, and always third party tested. Our current line includes CBD and CBG for people and pets. Live Brighter!

layout.text: What is the difference between CBD and CBG? Learn More.

We at Rolling Acre believe CBD and CBG remedies should be safe, clean, taste good, and affordable! This is why we put so much care into crafting our small batch proprietary blend of 1000mg CBD or CBG, MCT Oil, and delicious all-natural flavor.
